title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Encouraging a friends brilliance and good ideas boosts their confidence and strengthens your friendship. For instance, someone who is comfortable sharing their comedic genius with you may be hesitant to cultivate their talents. Of course, you might indeed be biased, but you can empower others to exercise their potential when they realize youre in their corner. Politician Seth Brown wrote, True friends will always push you towards the great possibilities of your future, false friends will always chain you to the mistakes in your past.
